Articles.Content:
I think there should be a mod that adds living creatures or aliens to other planets and they would either run away from you or give you items through KIS or whatever and also make bases and build rockets for you! This would be really complicated but I think it is very interesting. P.S, my friend gave me this idea, credits to him!

 

Edited January 26, 2018 by JEB'S DESTINY
Added stuff

I mean.... cool idea. But wrong subforum.

Also, this would mean coding AI for these creatures and some sort of interaction dialogue. Also, why would they make bases/rockets for you? That kinda defeats the point of the game, turning it more into I think an RPG. Cool if you want, but probably not for everyone and this would kinda invovle probably doing a decent amount of base coding or something.

Step 1: Mod idea.

Step 2: Make the mod.
This add-on discussion has been moved to Add-on Discussions.

36 minutes ago, razark said:

Step 1: Mod idea.

Step 2: Make the mod.

Step 3: Learn that coding is hard and give up

The coding would be difficult, but I will try to figure it out.

5 hours ago, qzgy said:

I mean.... cool idea. But wrong subforum.

Also, this would mean coding AI for these creatures and some sort of interaction dialogue. Also, why would they make bases/rockets for you? That kinda defeats the point of the game, turning it more into I think an RPG. Cool if you want, but probably not for everyone and this would kinda invovle probably doing a decent amount of base coding or something.

Well, I agree, with you, so I would take that out and just keep the interactions.

On 1/27/2018 at 4:21 AM, razark said:

Step 1: Mod idea.

Step 2: Make the mod.

RIP me, I don't even know how to code a plugin.
maybe just some skeletons on duna or tiny purple things in the same thing mod makers use to add in rocks and trees

On 1/26/2018 at 1:36 PM, JEB'S DESTINY said:

I think there should be a mod that adds living creatures or aliens to other planets and they would either run away from you or give you items through KIS or whatever and also make bases and build rockets for you! This would be really complicated but I think it is very interesting. P.S, my friend gave me this idea, credits to him!

 

Sounds cool, let us know how it turns out.

There are tons of great resources in the Dev forum and subforms. Also lots of youtube videos to get you started

 

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/36-add-on-development/

6 hours ago, RandomKerbal said:

RIP me, I don't even know how to code a plugin.

Do you have any idea how many modders started with "I don't even know how to code a plugin"?

There are MANY MANY MANY modders who started with a great idea and luckily decided "I can learn this".
... we even remember several names from that enthusiastic inifinity.
